statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = 'Level 10 achieved' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats = '{"score": 150, "level": 5}' WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = '{"level": 10, "medals": ["gold", "silver"]}' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats = '{"wins": 100, "losses": 50}' WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats='Wins: 10, Losses: 2' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements='Level 5 unlocked' WHERE username='jane_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements='New Achievement Unlocked' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats='Win:10, Loss:5' WHERE username='jane_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = ARRAY['First Place', 'Contender', 'Experienced Player'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE stats SET wins = 15, losses = 5, games_played = 20 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username='new_username' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE stats SET wins=wins+1, losses=losses+1 WHERE player_id=2;
UPDATE player_stats SET wins = wins + 1, matches_played = matches_played + 1 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_experience SET experience_points = experience_points + 100, experience_level = experience_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = '{"level": 5, "badges": ["warrior", "explorer"]}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET matches_played = 50, wins = 30, losses = 20 WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE player_profile SET total_achievements = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profile SET total_achievements = total_achievements + 1, total_stats = total_stats + 50 WHERE player_id = 1001
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE player_id = 1002 AND achievement_name = 'Master Slayer'
